long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sumo Party is an exciting and entertaining game that can be played for free on the Chrome Extension. You can also enjoy this game on the website https://monkeymart.org/. In "Sumo Party," you participate in thrilling sumo wrestling matches against other players. Take control of your sumo wrestler and use strategic moves to push your opponents out of the ring. The game features colorful graphics, intuitive controls, and fast-paced gameplay, ensuring a fun and engaging experience for players of all ages. Challenge your friends or compete against online opponents to become the ultimate sumo champion in "Sumo Party."


*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://monkeymart.org/
